attributes.action: Tell GCSE and A-Level students how exams will be affected by coronavirus ASAP.
attributes.background: There has been no clarity for exam students on how they’ll be affected by COVID-19. The uncertainty only adds to the stress to prepare for exams and ‘prepare as normal’ isn’t adequate when it is followed by ‘we will update you on changes’, students need to know ASAP so results are not affected.

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
